ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2021-01-01"), Surplus_Lines_Quote__c = True, Opportunity__r.Account.ShippingState = "Connecticut", ($Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator'), FS_Fees__c > 421)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: FS Fees for CT must not exceed $421 (500 - 79 State Filing Fee).
